div.span: Please click here for social-emotional support and resources available for students, parents and the community.
Please click here for district communication and information regarding the Coronavirus. This link will be updated regularly as information is sent out to the community.
Food Distribution Schedule During School Closure
Click here for schedule of locations and times of food distribution during the school closure and local food pantry resources for the community.
Click here for K-12 Student Resources for online learning.
L'Anse Creuse is now hiring bus drivers! Six hour minimum and paid training. If you are interested call (586) 783-6550 ext. 1113.
You can also apply online here.

img.alt: Class Reunions Find and submit reunion info

div.span: Looking for information about class reunions?
Click here to find a reunion or submit yours!
The newest edition of Living L'Anse Creuse is now available! We are proud to be able to share the wonderful stories of our students, staff and community members.

div.span: $77,000 spent last year on professional development
Business office recognized for Excellence in Financial Reporting for 31 years
17 Career and Technical Education classes offered
$538,000 awarded by Foundation to date in grants and scholarships
$30,000+ in future college tuition saved by families through dual enrollment
Clubs and co-curricular activities to fit all student interests
Esteemed music programs at all grade levels
Preschool childcare offered at two locations
66,000 Community service hours completed by Class of 2017
$7.5 million in scholarships offered to Class of 2017
I loved my 12 years of teaching 1st - 5th grade at Atwood and the past 5 years of teaching math at LC-East. LAnse Creuse is not only my educator, my employer but also my family.
My youngest attends Higgins elementary school. He is extremely shy at times and has anxiety. The Leader in Me program has helped him tremendously."
Harry L. Wheeler Community Center & Admin. Offices
